Name: Houla Houla Cocktail
Ingredients: 3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Orange generously laced with gin. Our previous version of this recipe called for just 20ml (⅔oz) orange juice, but I've come to realise this cocktail is better with a touch more juice.
History: Adapted from Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book but was first published in Robert Vermeire's 1922 Cocktails How to Mix Them and in other books spelt Hoola-Hoola or even Hula Hula. For the full story see Hula Hula, Houla Houla or Hoola-Hoola .
Nutrition: One serving of Houla Houla Cocktail contains 162 calories
